column5: Sorry if this has been posted before.  World Fishing Network has chosen Hastings, Ont. as the Ultimate Fishing Town. Port Colborne was runner up and Temagami was third. Congrats to the town of Hastings !  At least, there won't be hordes of people crowding Temagami this summer  http://www.worldfishingnetwork.com/uft/winners.php
I've fished that stretch of river before so I'm happy they won.
Oh great........ as if there weren't enough people fishing off the bridge already......
I was thinking the same thing..I fish that area quite often..It was busy before all this media..Now ill stick to the waters below lake seymor
